title: 口渴插件
author: Cassius_Zdq
txt_content: 谁有1.7.10的口渴插件？之前装了一个，配置文件不生成，麻烦发一下cauldron能用的

replies.author: HJ_KISS
replies.txt_content:
[综合|角色]ZhyDrinkWater —— 饮水插件，兼容食物mod的饮品，饥渴交加的感受[1.6.2]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=294399
(出处: http://www.mcbbs.net/)

[娱乐]饮水-Thirst - add more than hunger[1.8]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=481416
(出处: http://www.mcbbs.net/)


[娱乐]Thirst——让你感觉到口渴[1.7.9-1.8.1]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=400095
(出处: http://www.mcbbs.net/)
